      A town has scored and there is data on the attacking/defending town
      Parameters:
      defenderTown - - Town defending an attack
      attackerTown - - Town on the attack
      defenderPlayer - - Player defending
      attackerPlayer - - Player attacking
      n - - the score to be added (Integer)

    • getScores

      public List<String> getScores​(int maxListing)
      Gets the scores of a War
      Parameters:
      maxListing - Maximum lines to return. Value of -1 return all.
      Returns:
      A list of the current scores per town sorted in descending order.
